meanings.sent1: She carefully unsealed the envelope to read the letter inside.
meanings.sent2: The magician unsealed the box to reveal the hidden rabbit.
meanings.sent3: After struggling to unseal the jar, she finally got it open.
meanings.sent4: The detective unsealed the evidence, uncovering the truth behind the crime.
meanings.sent5: With a swift motion, he unsealed the ancient scroll, unveiling its contents.

meanings.definition: To open or reveal (something previously closed or secret)
meanings.sent1: The treasure map unsealed the location of the hidden chest.
meanings.sent2: The whistleblower unsealed the corruption within the company.
meanings.sent3: The surprise party was almost ruined when the guest accidentally unsealed the secret invitation.
meanings.sent4: Her smile unsealed the warmth hidden beneath her stoic exterior.
meanings.sent5: As the sun rose, it unsealed the beauty of the landscape, painting it in golden light.
